summary: Completed comprehensive testing of multi-language (i18n) support feature for RentAll marketplace. All language switching functionality works correctly - English, Spanish, and French translations are properly implemented with localStorage persistence.
passed_tests: Language selector (globe icon) visible in navbar
Clicking language selector shows dropdown with English, Spanish, French options with flags
Selecting Spanish changes UI text to Spanish correctly
Selecting French changes UI text to French correctly
Selecting English changes UI text back to English correctly
Language preference persists after page refresh (stored in localStorage as i18nextLng)
Homepage hero title translates correctly in all languages
Homepage hero subtitle translates correctly in all languages
Navigation items translate (Log in, Sign up)
Hero search placeholder translates (What do you need?/¿Qué necesitas?/Que recherchez-vous ?)
Feature section titles translate (Secure Payments, Easy Booking, Great Value)
critical_code_review_comments: Quick category tags in hero section use backend data (cat.name) instead of i18n translations - this is expected behavior since categories come from database API
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-language (i18n) support is fully implemented using react-i18next. Supports English, Spanish, and French. Language selector is a globe icon in navbar with compact variant. Language preference is stored in localStorage (key: i18nextLng) and persists across page refreshes. Translation files are in /app/frontend/src/i18n/locales/. All static UI text translates correctly. Note: Category names from API are not translated as they come from backend database.
